execution_plan.description: Identify invoice_numbers that are associated with at least 2 shipments (count shipments per invoice_number >= 2).
execution_plan.query: SELECT invoice_number, COUNT(*) AS shipment_count FROM shipments WHERE invoice_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY invoice_number HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve invoice dates and ids for the invoice_numbers found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_number IN ($step1.invoice_number);
